original: intros c a l H_series. unfold is_series in *. unfold filterlim in *. intros eps H_eps. destruct (H_series eps H_eps) as [N H_N]. exists N. intros n H_n. unfold eventually in *. specialize (H_N n H_n). rewrite -> Rmult_minus_distr_l. rewrite -> Rminus_0_r in H_N. rewrite -> Rmult_comm. rewrite -> Rmult_assoc. rewrite -> Rmult_comm with (r:=c). apply H_N.
